text: Soni (achimakafili) ŵaaluumbiile mwa Allah kulumbila kwao kwamachili kuti: Kwika mwakwaichilila chisimosimo mpaka achikulupilile kusyene. Jilani: “Chisimu isimosimo ili kwa Allah, ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye (jenumanja Asilamu) yanti namuno chili chiyiche (chisimosimocho) nganaŵa akulupilile?”
